ComicInfo.Title: Collision Course; Frozen Boyhood; Oaths; Honor; Dangerous Times
ComicInfo.Series: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine Special
ComicInfo.Summary:
Collision Course: Meteors hit DS9.
Frozen Boyhood: Jake has problems, Crew finds derlict ship.
Oaths: Bashir has to break the rules to help patient.
Honor: Jake and Rom help Nog.
Dangerous Times: Terrorists try to kidnap Odo.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 18:41:32. [CVDB233127] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 03:43:29. [Issue ID 57498]
